Spells:
Arcane Impotence (Ch3 Abju): R180' Target Channeler must use 4 Spell Energy to cast for next 8 rd (DC 14 Will 4 rd)
Arcane Interference (Ch5 Abju): Spells require additional 4 Spell Energy to affect 10' radius of touched for 8 min (DC 16 Will neg)
Assist (Ch1 Ench): R45' Targets in 30' radius gain +2 skill checks for conc + 1 rd
Bestow Spell (Ch4 Evoc): Touched conveys spell
Bleed Power (Ch2 Grea): Successful attacks on self inflict 1d6 HP each on up to 8 attackers for 80 min
Boil Blood (C3 Tran): R25' Target suffers 1d8 HP for 1 rd or conc + 1 rd (DC 14 Fort half)
Burial (Ch1 Tran): R45' Earth swallows target non-living, unattended object
Channel Might (Ch1 Evoc): Next successful melee attack by touched w/in 8 rd inflicts maximum+8 HP
Confer Power (Ch2 Tran): Transfers self spell energy to adjacent casters for 8 rd or conc + 1 rd
Fell Forbiddance (Ch2 Abju): R45' 8 5' sq area becomes impassible to undead for 8 min (DC 13 Will neg for intelligent)
Fey Fire (Ch2 Conj): Touched point contains invisible 5' radius fire that warms and heals 1 HP and all nonlethal damage for 8 hr
Fey Hearth (Ch2 Abju): R45' Creatures in 30' radius of target fire gain +2 Will saves and heal 1.5 x level HP for as long as fire lasts
Greater Questing Bird (Ch6 Conj): Self temporarily learns up to 6th level spell
Inspiration (Ch1 Ench): Touched gains +10 on one Craft check
Inspirational Might (Ch5 Ench): R45' 4 allies in 30' radius gain +2d10 temporary HP, +2 attack, +1 Fort for 4 rd
Joyful Speech (Ch1 Ench): R180' Listeners in 15' radius improve reaction to self, are unshaken, and gain +4 vs. fear for 8 rd
Know The Name (Ch1 Divi): Self learns name(s) of touched (DC 12 Will neg)
Lie (Ch1 Tran): Self gains +10 Bluff on next lie
Magic Circle Against Shadow (Ch5 Abju): 10' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves, supresses mental control, bars contact and entry (SR neg) by Shadow agents for 80 min
Memorial (Ch2 Divi): Touched 80' radius replays previous or next 8 min to next passerby
Pacify (Ch2 Abju): R45' 3 targets in 15' radius cannot attack for 4 rd (DC 13 Will neg)
Peasant's Rest (Ch1 Conj): Touched gets 8 hrs rest from 4 hrs sleep
Phantom Edge (Ch1 Tran): Touched weapon attacks as different type for 8 min (DC 12 Will neg)
Prestidigitation (Ch0 Evoc): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Questing Bird (Ch3 Conj): Self temporarily learns up to 3rd level spell
Scryer's Mark (Ch2 Divi): Touched suffers -4 Will vs. self scrying (DC 13 Will neg)
Speak With Fell (C3 Necr): R25' Compels 3 correct answers from target fell w/in 1 min (DC 14 Will neg)
Weather (Ch2 Conj): R180' Creates 60' radius, 30' high cylinder of rain or snow
Willful Stand (Ch3 Abju): R180' Target cannot attack self or enter threat space for conc (DC 14 Will neg)
Withering Speech (Ch2 Ench): R45' Target suffers -1 Wisdom and Charisma/min for conc
Woeful Speech (Ch1 Ench): R180' Listeners in 30' radius become shaken, suffer -2 vs. fear for 8 rd (DC 12 Will neg)
Magic Notes:
Art Of Magic: +1 character level for max spell level
Bonus Spell Energy: +7 Spell Energy
Bonus Spells: +12 Channeler Spells
Magecraft (Hermetic): Learn 3 W0 and 1 W1 spells, 1 Spell Energy
Spell Focus (Conjuration): +1 Spell DC (Conjuration)
Spellcasting (Conjuration): Learn 1 Channeler Conjuration spell; may learn more
Spellcasting (Evocation): Learn 1 Channeler Evocation spell; may learn more
Spellcasting (Transmutation): Learn 1 Channeler Transmutation spell; may learn more
Wisdom Legate Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level C1
Arcane Adept: Use magic device as W1
Heighten Spell: Increase chosen spell level
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Spontaneous Legate Spell: Cast Inflict in place of known spell
Temple Dependency: Must participate at temple to receive spells
Notes
Familiar: Raven "Hibko"

Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions w/in 1 mile
Share Spells: R5' Master share self spell w/companion
Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: Talk w/master in secret language
